embed.description: NMD-gamebot is the easiest way to view steam info in discord!.

fields.name: Add to discord
fields.value: NMD-Gamebot can be added to as many servers as you want! [Click here to add it to yours.](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=702489115383300126&permissions=523328&scope=bot)

fields.name: NMD-Gamebot commands
fields.value: These are the commands NMD-Gamebot accepts

fields.name: Function
value: Used to see a random cat picture
Check if the bot is currently online
Gives a list of games played in the last two weeks
